body: When you cast this spell, a spectral force binds a broken weapon together, relieving the broken condition for a short time. While under the effects of this spell, an item with the broken condition suffers no adverse effects from that condition, and is treated as if it is not broken. The object regains no hit points, and damage can still destroy the object.
description: Removes the broken condition from the targeted object.
level_text: Bard: 1; Skald: 1; Magus: 1; Sorcerer: 1; Wizard: 1; Arcanist: 1; Summoner: 1; Witch: 1

effects.text: one broken object of up to 2 lbs./level
effects.name: Target

component_text: V, S, M (a pinch of tree resin)
name: Jury-Rig
